Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Reroute near Howard/Rogers
ShortDescription: 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Exp buses temp rerouted SB: Howard Clark Touhy Sheridan NB: Sheridan Touhy Clark Rogers due to due to construction at Howard/Rogers

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Howard/Rogers, due to construction.

Southbound buses will operate via Howard, Clark, Touhy, Sheridan.

Northbound buses will operate via Sheridan, Touhy, Clark, Rogers.

Allow extra travel time.
